title: Ford Releases Inaugural Human Rights Report, Increases Climate Risk Disclosure in 2022 Integrated Report As It Transitions to Electric Future
description: Today Ford releases its 2022 Integrated Sustainability and Financial Report focused on the company’s transition to lead the electric revolution, including plans to scale production to more than 2 million electric vehicles per year by 2026 and to make half of its annual sales volume electric by the end of the decade.
